an2.21:1.3: Yo ca accayam accayato na passati, yo ca accayam desentassa yathadhammam nappatigganhati.
an2.21:2.3: Yo ca accayam accayato passati, yo ca accayam desentassa yathadhammam patigganhati.
an2.22:1.3: Duttho va dosantaro, saddho va duggahitena.
an2.22:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathagatam abbhacikkhanti”ti.
an2.23:1.3: Yo ca abhasitam alapitam tathagatena bhasitam lapitam tathagatenati dipeti, yo ca bhasitam lapitam tathagatena abhasitam alapitam tathagatenati dipeti.
an2.23:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathagatam abbhacikkhantiti.
an2.23:2.3: Yo ca abhasitam alapitam tathagatena abhasitam alapitam tathagatenati dipeti, yo ca bhasitam lapitam tathagatena bhasitam lapitam tathagatenati dipeti.
an2.23:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathagatam nabbhacikkhanti”ti.
an2.24:1.3: Yo ca neyyattham suttantam nitattho suttantoti dipeti, yo ca nitattham suttantam neyyattho suttantoti dipeti.
an2.24:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathagatam abbhacikkhanti”ti.
an2.25:1.3: Yo ca neyyattham suttantam neyyattho suttantoti dipeti, yo ca nitattham suttantam nitattho suttantoti dipeti.
an2.25:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathagatam nabbhacikkhanti”ti.
an2.26:1.1: “Paticchannakammantassa, bhikkhave, dvinnam gatinam annatara gati patikankha—
an2.26:2.1: Appaticchannakammantassa, bhikkhave, dvinnam gatinam annatara gati patikankha—
an2.27:1.1: “Micchaditthikassa, bhikkhave, dvinnam gatinam annatara gati patikankha—
an2.28:1.1: “Sammaditthikassa, bhikkhave, dvinnam gatinam annatara gati patikankha—
an2.30:1.1: “Dvaham, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamano arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevami.
an2.30:1.3: Attano ca ditthadhammasukhaviharam sampassamano, pacchimanca janatam anukampamano.
an2.30:1.4: Ime kho aham, bhikkhave, dve atthavase sampassamano arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevami”ti.
an2.31:1.12: Ragupakkilittham va, bhikkhave, cittam na vimuccati, avijjupakkilittha va panna na bhaviyati.
an2.31:1.13: Iti kho, bhikkhave, ragaviraga cetovimutti, avijjaviraga pannavimutti”ti.
